<< -right- wing,-born-again-submissive-spare-the-rod-spoil-the-child-
kids- in -the 'schoolroom' -in- the -basement -the ammo-is-in-the-Y2K
closet- >>

Wohooo!!! Heck of a description.

I'm in liberal la-la land, comparatively. I don't even think I know anyone
with a Y2K closet, as far as I know! But I have watched the South Park
episode about Y2K, so it's not like I ignored it COMPLETELY! <bwg>

Sandra
